timeline.message:
dont do no-op subscription update if not using pattern subscription
move log to initialization only
cleanup #build weirdness
explicitly initialize subscription

timeline.bodyText: Should we check that topicGroupId is not null?
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: I moved all calls  where topicGroupId would be null to now call the parameterless build() instead. We can actually make topicGroupId just a regular int now
replies.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: Hmm.. inside StreamThread do we guarantee we always call initializeSubscription before calling these two functions?
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: If not we should call initializeSubscription inside these two as well.
replies.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: I put this initialization inside build(), which gets called in the KafkaStreams constructor before any StreamThreads get created, so the InternalTopologyBuilder should always have an initialized subscription by the time it gets passed to a thread.
replies.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: Seems the callers are conditioned on usesPatternSubscription() already?
timeline.author: guozhangwang
